name: B. A Tide of Riverscape
statement:
The records are expressed as a string s of characters ”, ” and ”, where
” denotes a low tide, ” denotes a high tide, and ” denotes an unknown
one (either high or low).You are to help Mino determine whether it’s
possible that after replacing each ” independently with ” or ”, a given
integer p is a period of the resulting string. In case the answer is
yes, please also show such a replacement to Mino.In this problem, a
positive integer p is considered a period of string s, if for all 1
leq i
leq
lvert s
rvert - p, the i-th and (i + p)-th characters of s are the same. Here
lvert s
rvert is the length of s.
